response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. Given its exceptional value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment.

I am offering this product to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure you receive it at a competitive rate. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my commitment to finding the right owner for this remarkable item.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require additional information, I am more than happy to provide further details. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
